sense.gloss: to adhere to, to stick to, to cling to
to keep close to, to go along with
to get involved with, to be thick with, to become intimate

sdata.j: ぬれた↑服↑↓ふく↓は↑肌↑↓はだ↓に|くっつく|。
sdata.e: Wet clothes adhere to the skin.

sdata.j: この↑布↑↓ぬの↓は↑肌↑↓はだ↓に|くっつく|。
sdata.e: This cloth adheres to the skin.

sdata.j: ↑骨↑↓ほね↓が↑完全↑↓かんぜん↓に|くっつく|には１↑ヶ月↑↓かげつ↓くらいはかかるだろう。
sdata.e: It'll take the bone a month or so to set completely.

sdata.j: ↑泥↑↓どろ↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑靴↑↓くつ↓に|くっつく|。
この↑布↑↓ぬの↓は↑肌↑↓はだ↓に|くっつく|。
sdata.e: This cloth sticks to your skin.

sdata.j: ぬれた↑服↑↓ふく↓は↑肌↑↓はだ↓に|くっつく|。
sdata.e: Wet clothes stick to your skin.
